thread.title_full: Talented dog copies owner’s step-by-step Irish dance moves | Daily Mail Online

author: Isobel Frodsham For Mailonline
title: Talented dog copies owner’s step-by-step Irish dance moves | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The amazing video was published on Mary's Instagram , where the pay have gained a cult following for their brilliant tricks including yoga, drawing and weight lifting. They have nearly 30,000 followers. In a comment published alongside the video, Mary wrote: 'Here's a little video of us learning a step my lovely best friend made up for Secret! The pair are seen dancing in sync as they delicately skip around Mary's living room The video was published on Mary's Instagram, where the pay have gained a cult following for their brilliant tricks including yoga, drawing and weight lifting It has been viewed more than 11,000 times on Instagram and has received hundreds of comments of praise from people 'She just learned it, and I think it might be her favorite dance step to do so far. 'We've had a blast learning this one, thanks for the awesome choreography my friend!' The video has been viewed more than 11,000 times on Instagram and has received hundreds of comments of praise from people. One poster wrote: 'Omg your dog so freakin cute!!!!' while another commented: 'Okay this is absolutely amazing.' Read more: Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
